items.title: Works on Canvas
items.description_html: These intuitive, abstract paintings delve into the mysteries of feminine ancestry and transformation, emerging from an exploratory process. Layered color and gesture evoke echoes of resilience, rage, and love, honoring the cyclical nature of a woman’s life—how shifts across seasons embody both power and vulnerability. Each piece sparks moments of recognition, reminding us that individual journeys are woven into a universal tapestry of shared experience.

items.title: Works On Paper | Panel
items.description_html: A companion collection of works on paper shifts this exploration to the cosmos, examining supernovae—spectacular explosions marking the end of a supermassive star’s life cycle. In that final burst of light, matter scatters, revealing raw power and brilliance before dissolution. This cosmic cycle parallels the transformative arcs of women’s lives, reminding us that destruction can unearth beauty, renewal, and the promise of rebirth.
